greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Filter sequence for all such sequences S, for which S(A091206(k)) = constant for all k >= 3, where A091206 gives primes whose binary representation encodes a polynomial irreducible over GF(2).
comment: Restricted growth sequence transform of the ordered pair [A305900(n), A305903(n)].
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..100000
Index entries for sequences operating on GF(2)[X]-polynomials
program: partialsums(f,up_to) = { my(v = vector(up_to), s=0); for(i=1,up_to,s += f(i); v[i] = s); (v); }
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jun 16 2018
